name: Wizard Spells
description:
Welcome to Wizard Spells, a puzzle game created during the GMTK Game Jam 2021 event where you are a wizard who uses their spellbook to create objects by joining letters together and can also disenchant items to return them to their letter form. 

Traverse through a dungeon filled with puzzles to acquire the treasure within. 

The items you can create are: 

•    Box

•    Bow

•    Boat

•    Pot

•    Lamp

•    Bomb

Controls

Directional Buttons

Reset: R

Pick Up/ Put  Down Item/ Fire Bow: E

The Spellbook

Drag letters into the grid in the correct order to summon items to help you solve the puzzles.  Disenchant them, recalling the letters to you.
